steps.title: Inventory blockers
steps.notes: Gather outstanding tasks (missing CLIs, governance docs, CI wiring, capsule freeze, clean tree).

steps.title: Document readiness checklist
steps.notes: Author docs/maintenance/release-readiness.md summarizing required actions before committing to main.

steps.title: Broadcast guidance
steps.notes: Share checklist via manager-report so all agents align on release goal.

checkpoint.description: Release readiness checklist published and broadcast
